app.subtitle: Image Annotation Tool with IoT Integration

dashboard.title: AI Model Project Workflow
dashboard.subtitle: Seamless integration with NE301 devices, complete solution from data collection to model deployment
dashboard.getDevice: Get NeoEyes NE301 AI Camera Device

workflow.title: Complete Workflow
workflow.description: Six key steps from device data collection to model deployment

step1.title: Device Data Collection
step1.description: NE301 devices collect image data in real-time through built-in cameras, supporting various scenarios and lighting conditions

step2.title: Upload Images to Annotation Space
step2.description: Quickly upload collected image data to the annotation space, supporting batch upload and automatic management

step3.title: Quick Image Annotation
step3.description: Rich annotation tools supporting bounding boxes, polygons, keypoints, and more annotation methods for fast data labeling

step4.title: Train Model
step4.description: Based on YOLOv8 framework, train models using annotated data, supporting various model sizes and training parameter configurations

step5.title: Quantize and Export Model
step5.description: Quantize and optimize trained models, generating TFLite format models and NE301 device-specific configuration JSON files

step6.title: Rapid Deployment to NE301
step6.description: One-click compilation to generate model packages usable by NE301 devices, supporting rapid deployment and updates, achieving end-to-end closed loop

advantages.title: Features & Advantages
advantages.description: Why choose our AI Model Project solution

speed.title: Fast & Efficient
speed.description: End-to-end automation from data collection to model deployment, significantly reducing development cycles

accuracy.title: Precise Annotation
accuracy.description: Professional annotation tools and workflows ensure data quality and improve model performance

integration.title: Seamless Integration
integration.description: Deep integration with NE301 devices, one-stop solution for data collection, training, and deployment

reliability.title: Stable & Reliable
reliability.description: Proven model optimization and deployment processes ensure stability in production environments

modelSpace.title: Model Space

modelSpace.quantizeInputSizeHelp: Set the input image size for quantization (256-640)
modelSpace.classNamesHelp: Manually add class names for model testing and deployment. Add in order according to class index.
modelSpace.jsonInputHint: Enter class names in JSON array format, e.g.: ["person", "car", "bicycle"]

mqtt.externalRequired: This system requires an external MQTT Broker, please install and start:
mqtt.runMosquittoDocker: # Run Mosquitto (foreground, press Ctrl+C to stop)

troubleshooting.ensureRunning: Ensure MQTT Broker is running (e.g., Mosquitto, EMQX, etc.)
troubleshooting.checkAddress: Check if Broker address and port configuration are correct
troubleshooting.checkFirewall: Confirm firewall is not blocking port {{port}}
troubleshooting.checkDocker: If using Docker, ensure ports are correctly mapped
troubleshooting.checkAuth: Check if MQTT username and password are correct (if authentication is configured)

usage.title: Usage Instructions
usage.format: Message format is JSON, containing image data (Base64 encoded)
usage.autoSave: Server will automatically save images to current project
